data.name: Football Manager Ruined My Life
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Following his debut UK tour, and a sold out run at Edinburgh Fringe Festival, Tony Jameson brings his critically acclaimed stand up show, 'Football Manager Ruined My Life' to Steam.

Tony feels he's at the mid-point of his life. He believes he's achieved some good things, but there's still the nagging voice in the back of his head that wonders, 'Could he have achieved more had he not spent the past 20 years playing video games?'

Join one of the UK's hottest talents for 90 mins of silly stories and references to footballers you may / may not remember.

Tony is still touring the show. If you'd like to see it live, take a look at his schedule on his website http://www.tonyjameson.co.uk/gigs.html

data.reviews:
“You'll laugh from kick off to the final whistle...”
Scottish Herald

“Wonderful... terrific... life affirming stuff...”
The Skinny

“A charming performer with energy and enthusiam to spare... Painfully funny...”
The List

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
